enhanced_by.reason: The setClassLoader method directly sets the classLoader field, which is used by getClassLoader to determine the class loader.
The useContextClassLoader field influences whether the context class loader is used, affecting the result of getClassLoader.
The validate method may use the class loader returned by getClassLoader to instantiate objects, suggesting that the class loader's functionality can be tested through the validation process.
Both getClassLoader and getParameterValue access internal state to retrieve objects, suggesting that assertions about the class loader can be informed by the behavior of getParameterValue.
